tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE healthcare_recommendations (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    medical_history TEXT,
    predictive_model_output TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    health_condition VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Recommendations (
    recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    recommendation_text VARCHAR(255),
    recommendation_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  medical_history TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  treatment_plan TEXT,
  date_recorded TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE PredictiveModels (
  model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_name VARCHAR(50),
  algorithm_used VARCHAR(50),
  accuracy FLOAT,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    medical_history TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE HealthRecords (
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    record_date DATE,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    treatment TEXT,
    doctor_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Medications (
    medication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    medication_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    dosage VARCHAR(20),
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Predictions (
    prediction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    prediction_date DATE,
    predicted_diagnosis TEXT,
    confidence_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    medical_history JSONB
);
